name: @dadi/status
description: Returns a JSON object containing information about an application's platform, process and health state.

scripts.test: standard && env NODE_ENV=test ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover --report cobertura --report text --report html --report lcov ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha test
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post

author: DADI <team@dadi.tech>
